file_content.text: T7's last chrono entry of Coruscant = destruction of Jedi Temple // Memory recall = unpleasant
Anybody who isn't inspired by that view needs to check his pulse.
Is cold world. Both full and empty.
Coruscant sure is good at making a fella feel small. I guess it's kind of inspiring....
I've been to Coruscant twice, but it still amazes me. We're standing in the beating heart of the Republic.
Senate tower = important + fancy // T7 = should have gotten oil bath before coming
Master Kiwiiks always says we're fighting for the people inside the tower, not the tower itself. But I'm alright fighting for a tower that amazing, too.
Why so large building, just for Republic's elders?
The Senators are mighty proud of their office building, aren't they? Can't say I blame them.
The Senate tower. I've never actually been inside before--I'm looking forward to it.
Senate tower = redecorated since T7's last visit // Results = impressive
The people in here decide the fate of the galaxy every day. Let's try to keep them alive.
Is great honor you show your elders.
I don't know about you, but I'm feeling pretty underdressed. You suppose there's a place that rents formal wear around here?
This place is even more impressive than the holovids. Hard to believe we'll be reporting here from now on.
T7 sensors = detecting high levels of toxic chemicals being ingested by biologicals here
Smell that? Cheap Rodian ale and desperation. I'd recognize those aromas anywhere.
Prey drown weakness here. Is no place for us.
Wow... even the cantinas here are big. Darmas says this is the best watering hole on the planet.
Guys on Ord Mantell used to tell stories about this place. They're supposed to have the best Corellian whiskey on Coruscant.
Republic security forces = fighting armed hostiles // T7 + Jedi = lend assistance?
Looks like Republic security could use a lightsaber or two. Good thing we're here.
Why they cower here? Is points to be gained!
They're having shootouts in the street? And here I thought Coruscant wouldn't be any fun.
Barricades, armed standoffs... it feels like we're back on Ord Mantell, not the capital of the Republic.
Justicars' sector = very clean compared to Black Sun sector
I hate this place already. You just know this whole area's crawling with snipers.
All confusion here for simple travel. Faster to walk.
This place makes me nervous, Captain. Feels like we're being watched by the Justicars.
So a bunch of ex-soldiers take over the streets and call themselves the "Justicars." Sound like nutjobs to me.
T7 sensors = detecting unusual readings // Source = unknown + probably hostile
Our robes are going to smell like sewage and droid oil for weeks.
Fagh. Stinking.
Can't believe we're actually going down into the Works. Skavak better be down here!
Machines and maintenance areas like this keep the whole planet going. Pretty incredible.
Ruined Jedi Temple = T7's least favorite place
The Sith sure did a number on this place. Can't believe they got away with it.
Yuon spoke of this. Where Jedi fought bravely, stood against unstoppable foe. Is great honor to whole Jedi Order.
Man... sad to see a place like this all busted up. Wonder how many Jedi died here?
The Imps really messed this place up. The headquarters for the entire Jedi Order, and now it's just a pile of rubble.
T7 scanning starship registries // Many ships = reported as stolen
I guess if things go bad here, we can always flee on one of the Black Sun's rides.
Black Sun deserve to be prey.
These Black Sun fools don't mess around. Look at all that hardware.
We'd better stay sharp down here--I doubt the Black Sun is very welcoming toward authority figures.
Black Sun gangsters = everywhere // Jedi = proceed with caution
It's like a blasted free-for-all down here. Black Sun thugs everywhere. I'll watch your back.
Black Sun only hunt those weaker. Have no honor.
Time to roll up our sleeves and take out some trash. Let's show this Black Sun who's boss.
I guess the Black Sun just care about holding the turf, not keeping it clean.
Justicars' main base = close
That's a nice skyline view. Explains why the Justicars settled here.
Is Justicar hunting ground. Go softly.
Man, the Justicars make the Black Sun's operation look like a kiddie park.
All of these docks and loading equipment. What have the Justicars been up to?
T7 sensors = multiple armed organics nearby
These Justicars aren't messing around. Lot of firepower here.
Justicars are busy.
Looks like the Justicars are expanding their territory.
This looks like a full-scale military base, not some hideout for vigilantes.
Comm sensors = detecting multiple Justicar alarms
Nice place to visit. Wouldn't want to live here. Justicars have more rules than the Jedi.
Would be glory in destroying Justicars.
Boy, this place just keeps getting bigger. Where'd the Justicars get this much hardware?
This would actually be a nice part of the city if the Justicars weren't around.
Justicar prison = heavily guarded
This must be where the Justicars keep everyone they don't kill.
Why do Justicars cage prey, not kill?
Kinda expected the Justicars' prison to be a lot dirtier--not to mention, smaller.
The Justicars have their own prison... insane. The laws of the Republic don't mean a thing to these people.
Rogue droids = hostile to organics
Didn't think there was any place on Coruscant worse than the Justicars' sector. Wrong again, Kira....
Can feel electricity. Makes hide itching.
Those droids don't look happy to see us. Then again, I'm not happy to be in the Works. Guess we're even.
Lots of corners, lots of shadows--better keep our eyes open and watch for ambushes.
Water = bad for T7's servos
We found the one part of Black Sun territory that isn't on fire. Lucky us.
Lifeblood of Coruscant flows here.
This hydrosupply station better not rust my blasters. Figure I'll be needing them for a good long while.
Ugh. Nothing like a water treatment plant to get those really memorable smells.
Black Sun gangsters = attacking everyone
The Black Sun's getting target practice. Let's not give them any.
Choosing to live here, no air, no sky. Is strange.
I don't recommend loitering. This looks to be Black Sun central.
Tough to see slums like this when the people on the upper levels live just fine.
Cargo crates = stolen merchandise
I'm sure everything here was obtained legally. The Black Sun would never stoop to stealing.
Black Sun feed on blood and credits.
I bet the Black Sun stole half these cargo crates right off the spaceport docks.
Better watch our step. No telling what the Black Sun has stored in here.
Jedi Code = forbids gambling // T7 = friendly reminder
The next drunken gambler who touches me loses a hand--and I don't mean pazaak.
Seem even weaker from above.
I don't care what Darmas says, I could live without all the flashy lights in here. Good cantinas don't need all this foofaraw.
Big place. Not really my style, though. Corner cantinas with a good pack of regulars are more my speed.
Center = top-quality medical care facility
They've got the best autodocs in the galaxy here. We could use a medcenter like this back on Tython.
Had best treat Herald well.
This is a mighty nice place to get patched up when a deal goes sour. Coruscant knows a thing or two about medcenters.
Pretty nice medcenter. Much better than the field hospitals I'm used to.
